room_title: Escape room "Terror in Tinseltown" by Mighty Awesome Escape Rooms in San Marcos (CA)
room_address: 1030 La Bonita Drive Ste 140 San Marcos, CA 92078
room_description:
During Hollywood’s Golden Age in the 1940’s and 50’s, film noir dominated the cinemas. Enigmatic screenwriter, Moe Veeman, was one of the era’s most sought-after wordsmiths. After having a fallout with one of the major studios, Moe’s magnum opus script, “Twilight in Tinseltown,” became a thing of legend.
This legendary screenplay had only been read by select studio executives of the time before Moe vowed to destroy every last copy to keep them from profiting any further on his work… or so the story goes… With his recent passing and a rumor that Moe kept a copy for himself, there may be one last chance to find it!
